languages.text: Тайные плантации ксенорастения, кормящегося кровью серфов, производят яд-галлюциноген, язвящий гены жертв.
The clandestine cultivation of a xenoplant that feeds on the blood of serfs will allow the production of hallucinogenic poisons that contaminate the victims' genes.
languages.original_text: Тайные плантации ксенорастения, кормящегося кровью серфов, производят яд-галлюциноген, язвящий гены жертв.

traits.locale_text: Hidden plantations will allow the production of hallucinogenic poisons that sting the victims' very genes.

The clandestine cultivation of a xenoplant that feeds on the blood of serfs will allow the production of hallucinogenic poisons that contaminate the victims' genes.

languages.text: La culture clandestine d'une xénoplante qui a la particularité de se nourrir du sang des serfs permettra de produire des poisons hallucinogènes contaminant les gènes de ses victimes.
languages.original_text: The clandestine cultivation of a xenoplant that feeds on the blood of serfs will allow the production of hallucinogenic poisons that contaminate the victims' genes.

traits.locale_text: La culture clandestine d'une xénoplante qui a la particularité de se nourrir du sang des serfs permettra de produire des poisons hallucinogènes contaminant les gènes de ses victimes.

languages.text: ゼノプラントの密かな栽培は、農奴の血を喰らい、幻覚作用のある毒物を生産する。この毒物は、被害者の遺伝子を汚染する。
languages.original_text: The clandestine cultivation of a xenoplant that feeds on the blood of serfs will allow the production of hallucinogenic poisons that contaminate the victims' genes.

traits.locale_text: ゼノプラントの密かな栽培は、農奴の血を喰らい、幻覚作用のある毒物を生産する。この毒物は、被害者の遺伝子を汚染する。

languages.text: 异形种植园内种植着可怕的异形植物，以仆役的鲜血为食。这种植物可以产生致幻毒素，污染受害者的基因。
languages.original_text: The clandestine cultivation of a xenoplant that feeds on the blood of serfs will allow the production of hallucinogenic poisons that contaminate the victims' genes.

traits.locale_text: 异形种植园内种植着可怕的异形植物，以仆役的鲜血为食。这种植物可以产生致幻毒素，污染受害者的基因。

languages.text: El cultivo clandestino de una xenoplanta que se alimenta de la sangre de sirvientes permitirá producir venenos alucinógenos que contaminarán los genes de sus víctimas.
languages.original_text: The clandestine cultivation of a xenoplant that feeds on the blood of serfs will allow the production of hallucinogenic poisons that contaminate the victims' genes.

traits.locale_text: El cultivo clandestino de una xenoplanta que se alimenta de la sangre de sirvientes permitirá producir venenos alucinógenos que contaminarán los genes de sus víctimas.

languages.text: Der geheime Anbau einer Xenopflanze, die sich von dem Blut von Sklaven ernährt, ermöglicht die Produktion halluzinogener Gifte, welche die Gene der Opfer kontaminieren.
languages.original_text: The clandestine cultivation of a xenoplant that feeds on the blood of serfs will allow the production of hallucinogenic poisons that contaminate the victims' genes.

traits.locale_text: Der geheime Anbau einer Xenopflanze, die sich von dem Blut von Sklaven ernährt, ermöglicht die Produktion halluzinogener Gifte, welche die Gene der Opfer kontaminieren.

languages.text: Kölelerin kanıyla beslenen bir zenobitkinin gizli üretimi, verildiği kişinin genlerini bozan halüsinojenik zehirlerin imalatını mümkün kılacak.
languages.original_text: The clandestine cultivation of a xenoplant that feeds on the blood of serfs will allow the production of hallucinogenic poisons that contaminate the victims' genes.
